actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit O. J. Shaw and Haroldine L. Shaw, his wife and O. J. Shaw Junior, a married man, and Richard A. Shaw, a single man, to name the United States as a defendant in a suit to determine title to certain parcels of real property herein described.

summary.text: Permits O. J. Shaw and Haroldine L. Shaw, his wife and O. J. Shaw Junior, a married man, and Richard A. Shaw, a single man, to name the United States as a defendant in a suit to determine title to certain parcels of real property.

titles.title: A bill to permit O. J. Shaw and Haroldine L. Shaw, his wife and O. J. Shaw Junior, a married man, and Richard A. Shaw, a single man, to name the United States as a defendant in a suit to determine title to certain parcels of real property herein described.
